Title: Dinotopia
Actors: David Thewlis, Katie Carr, Jim Carter, Alice Krige
Plot: Karl & David, two boys flying a small airplane over the ocean with their father,crash land near an uncharted island. The boys swim safely to shore,but their father sadly drowns in the crash.The brothers meet the people & dinosaurs of this strange island.
Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 5 wins & 16 nominations.
